subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Like Jason Kidd and Grant Hill before him, the Miami Heat’s star guard said he wanted no part of the Knicks, an organization with little chance of competing with the league’s elite teams.
snippet: Like Jason Kidd and Grant Hill before him, the Miami Heat’s star guard said he wanted no part of the Knicks, an organization with little chance of competing with the league’s elite teams.
